me.coley.addressbook.service.impl

Class ElasticContactService

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.coley.addressbook.service.impl.ElasticContactService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, ContactService

    public class ElasticContactService
extends Object
implements ContactService, AutoCloseable
    A contact service where the contact information is stored in an ElasticSearch server.

      • update

        public Contact update(Contact contact)
               throws MissingContactException
        Description copied from interface: ContactService
        Update an existing content by providing a model of the new contact information.
        Specified by:
        update in interface ContactService
        Parameters:
        contact - A minimal contact that will have its information copied to the existing contact by the same identifier.
        Returns:
        Old contact.
        Throws:
        MissingContactException - When no matching contact by the given minimal contact's identifier can be found.
